name: system_info
query: SELECT hostname, os_version, os_major, os_minor, os_build FROM system_info;

name: memory_info
query: SELECT memory_total, memory_free, swap_total, swap_used FROM memory_info;

name: cpu_info
query: SELECT model, cores, physical_cores, cpu_type, max_clock_speed FROM cpu_info;

name: interface_addresses
query: SELECT interface, family, address FROM interface_addresses;

name: mounts
query: SELECT path, total, used, available FROM mounts;

name: usb_devices
query: SELECT vendor, model, serial FROM usb_devices;
